page.title: 12BORWICK HALL
page.content: Borwick Hall is owned by{Lancashire {Youth Clubs Association}and{Lancashire {Education Authority.}The hall is used to give courses to young whose employees think a course would be benificial.These people come from a variety of areas.The hall accommodates {44}to{46}people.The hall is a Tudor mansion set in{10 acres}of land.It has beautiful gardens and there is access to woodland.In the hall there is a library,dining room,billiard room,licensed bar and pool room.Sports can be played here eg Tennis.Canoeing on the canal,Netball and equipment may be used by organised groups eg Video recorder,disco deck,slide and film strip.In the grounds surrounding the hall is a new Borwick Hall.This accommodates{47 people}and it is centrally heated with a lounge,T.V room and other facilities.
